segments.text: I notice the sun streaming through the open window, illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It contrasts sharply with the chaos unfolding inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just so wrapped up in her task; she must feel content in her little bubble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that bubble seems so fragile with the water flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how the children are sneaking cookies—it’s like a scene from a storybook.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s precarious position on that stool makes my heart race; it can’t be safe at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I shake my head at the situation; it feels like chaos in an otherwise peaceful kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
